text: <@U01QVR44MEY> Any way you have some documentation I could read on how to call the Azure Serverless Function I created from the React card? I get how to do it with HS Native serverless functions, but I'm a bit lost on how to do it with a function I'm hosting elsewhere.
so you have to call the HubSpot serverless function first and then from that function you can call the Azure function
You can't directly call the Azure function right from the card
Gotcha, see I'm doing that with an axios.get call to my Azure function, and I'm setting the timeout to 90000 milliseconds... it still times out after 20 seconds though.
yeah currently you can't get more then 20 seconds
What are you calling that takes more than 20 seconds?
I'm sending the VID to pull some data from our database, and sending that data to an LLM for summarization.
understood, yeah it's a little unfortunate but you might need to use the iframe component if you can't get the time out under control
caching responses is also something you'll want to make sure you do
I already have a solution using the iframe component, was just trying to pull more into the actual card rather than a new window.
yeah totally get that. Sorry man
Looks nicer if it seams like HubSpot is providing the summarization natively.
